extendedInfo.description: Did you ever regret not having straws, or scissors to cut them, or the age to still settle arguments by drawing the shortest straw?Well there it is, the application that does it for you.You can choose the number of straws, the number of short straws among them, and then just.. draw :)Throw a dice, flip a coin, draw straws - there is always a situation where you find you need to rely on chance to make a decision. Have fun!

reviews.title: Doesn\'t make sense
reviews.comment: I mean come on at least make it understandable and fun
reviews.author: Hope Mues
